author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away in a single driver
releaseNotes: Version 0.0.1 - Initial release of the All-in-One Presence Detection System. This driver integrates WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away functionality into a single comprehensive solution.
